T02D3300:42a-1: sam kshi pta badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3300:42a-3: mdor bsdus pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3300:42a-4: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yang dga' ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D3300:42a-5: rang gi snying gar zla ba la yi ge aom gyi 'od zer spros pas /
T02D3300:42a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs la mdun du dmigs te /
T02D3300:42a-10: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa rnams byas la /
T02D3300:42a-11: nam mkha' dang mtshungs par khams gsum rnam par bsams te /
T02D3300:42a-12: h'um las rdo rje'i rnam par gyur pa'i sa gzhir /
T02D3300:42a-13: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su chos 'byung gi nang du chad pa'i padma'i lte ba la /
T02D3300:42a-14: zla ba la gnas pa'i nyi zla kha sbyar ba la gnas pa'i yi ge pam las rdo rje'o //
T02D3300:42a-15: de'i sa bon las legs par byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo ste /
T02D3300:42a-16: bsreg pa'i bskal pa'i me dang kha dog mtshungs pa /
T02D3300:42a-18: g-yas pas ni phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba ma
T02D3300:42a-19: rungs pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad cing rdo rje
T02D3300:42b-0: @42b bsnams pa / g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02D3300:42b-1: 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan brkyang bskum gyis mnan pa /
T02D3300:42b-2: zhal phyogs rnams su gzigs pa /
T02D3300:42b-3: skra lhug par gyur cing thod pa'i dum bu'i smad ka dang ldan pa /
T02D3300:42b-4: zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma /
T02D3300:42b-7: spyi bo na sna tshogs rdo rje dang ldan zhing /
T02D3300:42b-8: thod pa'i phreng bas mdzes ma /
T02D3300:42b-9: mgo bo brgyus pa'i phreng bas 'jigs pa'i sku mdzes pa /
T02D3300:42b-10: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis sku brgyan pa /
T02D3300:42b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur nas //
T02D3300:42b-12: rnam par snang mdzad rigs byung ba'o //
T02D3300:42b-13: dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin ma //
T02D3300:42b-14: sku ni spro dang bsdu bar te //
T02D3300:42b-15: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba yang //
T02D3300:42b-16: rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag pas bya //
T02D3300:42b-17: gus dang bcas pas rtag bsgoms na //
T02D3300:42b-18: sangs rgyas nyid ni blang bar 'thob //
T02D3300:42b-19: bsgom pa byas la dgod bya zhing //
T02D3300:42b-20: rnal 'byor rig pas gtor ma gtang //
T02D3300:42b-21: aom rdo rje phag mo ni lte bar ro //
T02D3300:42b-22: h'um yom ya mi ni snying gar ro //
T02D3300:42b-23: hr'im mom rmugs byed ma ni kha la'o //
T02D3300:42b-24: hrem hrim kun du skyod byed ma ni mgo bo la'o //
T02D3300:42b-25: h'um h'um kun du skrag byed ma ni spyi bo la'o //
T02D3300:42b-26: phat phat gtum mo ni yan lag thams cad la mtshon char ro //
T02D3300:42b-27: lte ba snying ga de bzhin kha dang ni //
T02D3300:42b-28: mgo bo spyi bo mtshon cha nyid kyang ngo //
T02D3300:42b-29: rtse mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par rtse sprad cing //
T02D3300:42b-30: mthe bong rdo rje dag ni brtan par legs btsir te //
T02D3300:42b-31: dpral ba'i dbus su legs pa nyid du bzhag byas la //
T02D3300:42b-32: kun nas bskor ba'i skor bar byed pas bskor bar bya //
T02D3300:42b-33: rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta byed pas //
T02D3300:42b-34: spyi nas phem gyi sgra ni brjod bya zhing //
T02D3300:42b-35: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi //
T02D3300:42b-36: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bod par bya //
T02D3300:42b-37: aom rnal 'byor dag pas chos thams cad kyi rnal 'byor dag pa ni bdag yin no //
T02D3300:42b-38: aom aa ra lli ho:dza:h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n+ya sa ma ya stv'am dri shya ho:/
T02D3300:42b-39: rdo rje'i snyim pa gyen du kha phye la //
T02D3300:42b-40: nam phyed na ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D3300:42b-41: aom kha kha kh'a ti kh'a hi sarba ya ksha
T02D3300:42b-42: ra sarba bh'u tapre ta pi sh'a tsa au ma
T02D3300:42b-43: da ya aa pa sma ra d'a ki n+ya da
T02D3300:42b-44: ya ai mam ba lim gri hna ntu sa ma
T02D3300:42b-45: ya ra ksha ntu ma ma si ddhi pram ya
T02D3300:43a-0: tstshantu ya thee bam ya bee shtam @43a * //
T02D3300:43a-2: pi pa th'a ma ti kra ma tha ma ma
T02D3300:43a-3: sarba aa ka ra satva su kha bi shuddha ye
T02D3300:43a-4: sa h'a ya k'a bha ba ntu h'um h'um phat
T02D3300:43a-5: sv'a h'a / gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D3300:43a-6: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3300:43a-7: snying po'i sngags yi ge bcu pa'o //
T02D3300:43a-8: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
T02D3300:43a-9: badzra ba rna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3300:43a-10: nye ba'i snying po yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
T02D3300:43a-11: aom sarba k'a mi ni sarba bha ksha sho dha ya gu hyam badzra ni h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3300:43a-12: zas thams cad spyod par byed pa'i sngags so /
T02D3300:43a-13: yang na gdams ngag gis rang gi sems brtan par
T02D3300:43a-14: byed 'dod pas rang gi lte ba'i padma'i steng du
T02D3300:43a-15: zla ba kha sbyor gyi nang du gnas pa'i yi
T02D3300:43a-16: ge bam yungs kar phra mo'i tshad tsam las nges
T02D3300:43a-17: par byung ba'i padma'i de kho na nyid kyi rnam
T02D3300:43a-18: pa'i 'od zer bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3300:43a-19: khams gsum 'od gsal zhing bde ba chen po'i rnam par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3300:43a-20: 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
